headline: Get Income Like Warren Buffett: 3 Dividend Stocks in Berkshire Hathaway's Portfolio That Pay You Back
summary: Warren Buffett is famous because of the long-term success he has achieved running Berkshire Hathaway.  Second, it doesn't pay dividends despite the fact that Buffett often invests in dividend-paying companies.  Here's why that matters and why you might want to buy one of these three dividend payers he owns.

headline: These Oil Stocks Can Thrive Even With Crude Prices Sinking
summary: Oil prices have tumbled this year.  Lower crude prices will impact oil company cash flows.  Three oil companies that can still thrive in the current environment are Devon Energy (NYSE: DVN), ConocoPhillips (NYSE: COP), and Chevron (NYSE: CVX).
